questions.question_text: "visibility" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The ability to be easily seen or clearly understood
questions.example_sentence: The new system improves visibility into project progress across teams.
questions.explanation:
可視性・見えやすさ
承認手続き
コスト削減
システム障害

questions.question_text: "coordinate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To organize activities so they work together effectively
questions.example_sentence: Managers must coordinate tasks across departments to avoid delays.
questions.explanation:
調整する・連携させる
中止する
記録する
権限委譲

questions.question_text: "rollout" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The introduction of a new system or product
questions.example_sentence: The rollout of the new platform will occur in multiple phases.
questions.explanation:
導入・展開
停止
評価面談
監査

questions.question_text: "mandatory" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Attendance at one training session is mandatory for project staff.
questions.explanation:
義務的な
任意
将来検討
管理職限定

questions.question_text: "transition" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The process of changing from one system or state to another
A delay caused by technical issues
questions.example_sentence: Employees are encouraged to prepare for the transition to the new system.
questions.explanation:
移行・転換
組織構造
遅延
契約
